wpPost.title: A chance encounter
wpPost.content:
last evening whilst eating our dinner on the hotel patio a fellow biker approached us and said are you the three on the Cub 50’s?

We said yes that’s us, he explained he’d ridden from Kendal that morning stopping a Carlisle’s McDonald’s drive through for breakfast where the hostess had told him about us. Dee smiled and said was she called Jodie, he said yes how do you know that, Dee said that’s my daughter. What are the chances of that?
